Articles.Content:
So... How does a badass kerbalnaut go about horizontal travel in everyday life?

On a jetbike, naturally.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I do not really know where to upload the ship file and don't really know if anyone is even interested.

The bike requires a load of mods including NEAR/FAR, TweakScale, B9 and KAS. Might be some others aswell as I have a long list of mods active.

And here are two videos of the thing in action. First one is some cruising around the KSC and the second one is a super low quality recording of the top speed.

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/c/6001269

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/c/6001289

I highly appreciate comments...
Nice one ) What are the max altitude and top speed numbers? Minimum landing speed with FAR?
It is designed not to lift off at all. That is why FAR/NEAR is required. It has downforce, which keeps it on the ground and stable up to 120m/s or so.
